typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SiteName as string,
		SiteLookup as string,
		fkSite as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LookupSite
source(output(
		BrewName as string,
		DateStarting as date,
		TimeLine as string,
		FlowMeasure as string,
		Section as string,
		Area as string,
		Value as double,
		Line as string,
		Brewhouse as string,
		MetricName as string,
		PeriodDate as date,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		pkiSDLevers as long,
		fkBatchID as integer,
		SourceLine as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LookupTestSource
LookupTestSource select(mapColumn(
		BrewName,
		TimeLine,
		FlowMeasure,
		Section,
		Area,
		Line,
		Brewhouse,
		MetricName,
		pkiSDLevers,
		SourceLine
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(fkSite = LookupTestSiteSink#lookup(BrewName).fkSite) ~> DerivedColumn1
LookupSite select(mapColumn(
		SiteLookup,
		fkSite
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	keys:['SiteLookup'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		SiteLookup,
		fkSite
	)) ~> LookupTestSiteSink
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		BrewName as string,
		TimeLine as string,
		FlowMeasure as string,
		fkSite as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		BrewName,
		TimeLine,
		FlowMeasure,
		fkSite
	)) ~> LookupTestResSink
